index.positive-nudges.quote.roland-text: I tried a lot of tools to organize my days but lost focus quickly.

index.contact.title: Contact
index.secure-contact.title: Secure Contact
index.secure-contact.teaser: Email communication is not secure by design, thus, if you want to send a real secure mail, you can use my Public PGP Key. PGP encryption ensures, that just I can read the mail. Software like {software} supports secure mails easily.
index.background.title: Background on Fibi and their creators
index.background.tab.who-am-i-why-fibi.t: Hello, I'm Rolandâ€”a software developer with autism and ADHD who's always struggled to stay organized. I dreamed of a personal helper who could nudge me gently, remind me of tasks, and keep everything in one place. Once large language models emerged, it finally felt possible to bring "Fibi" to life!
index.background.tab.ongoing-journey-of-: The ongoing journey of Fibi Fibi already supports tasks, calendar syncing (CalDAV/ICS), reminders, timers, and even a morning routine feature. But there's more I'd love to improve. I'm currently running a smaller language model locally for privacy, and new hardware would help me scale while keeping your data secure and private. That's why I'm seeking fundingâ€”to build a more robust system and add the advanced features our community needs, all without handing any personal data to third parties.
legal-notice.title: Legal notice
legal-notice.contact.title: Contact
index.footnote.these-are-features-id-lov: * These are features I'd love to implement, but that are complex and need funding.

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.necessary: We process your IP address (anonymized) to prevent attacks on our website hosted by strato.de. This is necessary for security purposes and cannot be disabled.
privacy.analytics: I accept that you collect browser and platform data to improve your services.
privacy.tracking: I accept that you collect behavioral information to improve user experience and track service performance.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Fibi
meta.description: Information about how we handle your data at Fibi

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: This privacy policy explains how I, Roland Steinegger, handle your personal data when you use Fibi. I am committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information.

data-processing.title: Data Processing
data-processing.intro: I process different types of data depending on your privacy settings:

necessary.title: Necessary Data Processing
necessary.text: For security purposes, I process your anonymized IP address to prevent attacks on my website hosted by {hostingProvider}. This processing is necessary for the operation of the website and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Data
analytics.text: If you accept analytics, I collect browser and platform data to improve my services. This includes information about your browser type, operating system, and device type. This data helps me understand how users interact with my website and improve the user experience.

tracking.title: Behavioral Tracking
tracking.text: If you accept tracking, I collect behavioral information to enhance user experience and track service performance. This includes information about how you interact with my website, such as which pages you visit and how long you stay on them.

legal-basis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legal-basis.text: The processing of your data is based on your consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR) for analytics and tracking. The processing of your IP address for security purposes is based on my legitimate interest in protecting my website (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).

data-retention.title: Data Retention
data-retention.text: I retain your data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected. Analytics and tracking data are retained for up to 26 months. Security logs containing IP addresses are retained for up to 7 days.

your-rights.title: Your Rights
your-rights.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
your-rights.access: Right to access your personal data
your-rights.rectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
your-rights.erasure: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or your personal data, please contact me at {email}

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.text: More information can be found in our privacy policy.
